sn35.84:1.2: Then Venerable Ānanda went up to the Buddha, bowed, sat down to one side, and said to him:
sn35.84:2.1: “Sir, they speak of this thing called ‘the world’.
sn35.84:2.3: “Ānanda, that which wears out is called the world in the training of the Noble One.
sn35.84:2.5: The eye wears out. Sights … eye consciousness … eye contact wears out. The painful, pleasant, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by eye contact also wears out.
sn35.84:2.7: The mind … thoughts … mind consciousness … mind contact wears out. The painful, pleasant, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by mind contact also wears out.
sn35.84:2.8: That which wears out is called the world in the training of the Noble One.”
